name: storagehub-e2e-dappwright
description: StorageHub SDK E2E tests using dAppwright for MetaMask automation

scripts.install-deps: pnpm install --ignore-workspace && pnpm exec playwright install chromium
scripts.serve:web: bash -lc 'PID=$(lsof -ti tcp:3000 || true); if [ -n "$PID" ]; then kill -9 "$PID"; fi; python3 -m http.server 3000 --directory ..'
